MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut affecting the TD2, TD3 and TD10 postcode areas of Gordon, Lauder and Duns. It has been necessary for our engineers to carry out an emergency shutdown at 1:42pm due to reports of a road traffic accident damaging an electricity pole and this may affect the supply to your property. We will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 3:45pm. We will update this message if this information changes We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 2:10pm on 23rd November 2020.
